tags.name: Changesets
tags.description: Controller to handle all Rest Calls for Changeset Changes

tags.name: Items
tags.description: Controller that handles REST API calls for Tfvc Items

get.description: Retrieve Tfvc changes for a given changeset.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the changeset. Default: null

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Number of results to skip. Default: null

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default: null

parameters.name: continuationToken
parameters.description: Return the next page of results. Default: null

get.description: Retrieves the work items associated with a particular changeset.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: ID of the changeset.

post.description: Returns changesets for a given list of changeset Ids.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: body
parameters.description: List of changeset IDs.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: labelId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of label

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Max number of items to return

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Number of items to skip

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: shelvesetId
parameters.description: Shelveset's unique ID

parameters.name: requestData.includeDetails
parameters.description: Whether to include policyOverride and notes Only applies when requesting a single deep shelveset

parameters.name: requestData.includeLinks
parameters.description: Whether to include the _links field on the shallow references. Does not apply when requesting a single deep shelveset object. Links will always be included in the deep shelveset.

parameters.name: requestData.includeWorkItems
parameters.description: Whether to include workItems

parameters.name: requestData.maxChangeCount
parameters.description: Max number of changes to include

parameters.name: requestData.maxCommentLength
parameters.description: Max length of comment

parameters.name: requestData.name
parameters.description: Shelveset name

parameters.name: requestData.owner
parameters.description: Owner's ID. Could be a name or a guid.

get.description: Get changes included in a shelveset.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: shelvesetId
parameters.description: Shelveset's unique ID

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: Max number of changes to return

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Number of changes to skip

get.description: Get work items associated with a shelveset.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: shelvesetId
parameters.description: Shelveset's unique ID

get.description: Get branch hierarchies below the specified scopePath

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: scopePath
parameters.description: Full path to the branch.  Default: $/ Examples: $/, $/MyProject, $/MyProject/SomeFolder.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: includeDeleted
parameters.description: Return deleted branches. Default: False

parameters.name: includeLinks
parameters.description: Return links. Default: False

post.description:
Create a new changeset.

Accepts TfvcChangeset as JSON body

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

get.description:
Retrieve Tfvc Changesets

Note: This is a new version of the GetChangesets API that doesn't expose the unneeded queryParams
present in the 1.0 version of the API.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: maxCommentLength
parameters.description: Include details about associated work items in the response. Default: null

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Number of results to skip. Default: null

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default: null

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Results are sorted by ID in descending order by default. Use id asc to sort by ID in ascending order.

parameters.name: searchCriteria.author
parameters.description: Alias or display name of user who made the changes.

parameters.name: searchCriteria.followRenames
parameters.description: Whether or not to follow renames for the given item being queried.

parameters.name: searchCriteria.fromDate
parameters.description: If provided, only include changesets created after this date (string).

parameters.name: searchCriteria.fromId
parameters.description: If provided, only include changesets after this changesetID.

parameters.name: searchCriteria.includeLinks
parameters.description: Whether to include the _links field on the shallow references.

parameters.name: searchCriteria.itemPath
parameters.description: Path of item to search under.

parameters.name: searchCriteria.mappings
parameters.description: Following criteria available (.itemPath, .version, .versionType, .versionOption, .author, .fromId, .toId, .fromDate, .toDate) Default: null

parameters.name: searchCriteria.toDate
parameters.description: If provided, only include changesets created before this date (string).

parameters.name: searchCriteria.toId
parameters.description: If provided, a version descriptor for the latest change list to include.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: id
parameters.description: Changeset Id to retrieve.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: maxChangeCount
parameters.description: Number of changes to return (maximum 100 changes) Default: 0

parameters.name: includeDetails
parameters.description: Include policy details and check-in notes in the response. Default: false

parameters.name: includeWorkItems
parameters.description: Include workitems. Default: false

parameters.name: maxCommentLength
parameters.description: Include details about associated work items in the response. Default: null

parameters.name: includeSourceRename
parameters.description: Include renames.  Default: false

parameters.name: $skip
parameters.description: Number of results to skip. Default: null

parameters.name: $top
parameters.description: The maximum number of results to return. Default: null

parameters.name: $orderby
parameters.description: Results are sorted by ID in descending order by default. Use id asc to sort by ID in ascending order.

parameters.name: searchCriteria.author
parameters.description: Alias or display name of user who made the changes.

parameters.name: searchCriteria.followRenames
parameters.description: Whether or not to follow renames for the given item being queried.

parameters.name: searchCriteria.fromDate
parameters.description: If provided, only include changesets created after this date (string).

parameters.name: searchCriteria.fromId
parameters.description: If provided, only include changesets after this changesetID.

parameters.name: searchCriteria.includeLinks
parameters.description: Whether to include the _links field on the shallow references.

parameters.name: searchCriteria.itemPath
parameters.description: Path of item to search under.

parameters.name: searchCriteria.mappings
parameters.description: Following criteria available (.itemPath, .version, .versionType, .versionOption, .author, .fromId, .toId, .fromDate, .toDate) Default: null

parameters.name: searchCriteria.toDate
parameters.description: If provided, only include changesets created before this date (string).

parameters.name: searchCriteria.toId
parameters.description: If provided, a version descriptor for the latest change list to include.

post.description: Post for retrieving a set of items given a list of paths or a long path. Allows for specifying the recursionLevel and version descriptors for each path.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

get.description: Get a list of Tfvc items

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: scopePath
parameters.description: Version control path of a folder to return multiple items.

parameters.name: recursionLevel
parameters.description: None (just the item), or OneLevel (contents of a folder).

values.description: Only return the specified item.
Return the specified item and its direct children.
Return the specified item and its direct children, as well as recursive chains of nested child folders that only contain a single folder.
Return specified item and all descendants

parameters.name: includeLinks
parameters.description: True to include links.

parameters.name: versionDescriptor.version
parameters.description: Version object.

values.description: None.
Return the previous version.
Only usuable with versiontype MergeSource and integer versions, uses RenameSource identifier instead of Merge identifier.
Version is treated as a ChangesetId.
Version is treated as a ChangesetId.
Version is treated as a Shelveset name and owner.
Version is treated as a Change.
Version is treated as a Date.
If Version is defined the Latest of that Version will be used, if no version is defined the latest ChangesetId will be used.
Version will be treated as a Tip, if no version is defined latest will be used.
Version will be treated as a MergeSource.

parameters.description: Number of labels to skip

parameters.name: labelId
parameters.description: Unique identifier of label

parameters.name: project

parameters.name: requestData.includeLinks

parameters.name: requestData.itemLabelFilter

get.description: Return a collection of shallow shelveset references.

parameters.name: requestData.includeDetails
parameters.description: Whether to include policyOverride and notes Only applies when requesting a single deep shelveset

parameters.name: requestData.includeLinks
parameters.description: Whether to include the _links field on the shallow references. Does not apply when requesting a single deep shelveset object. Links will always be included in the deep shelveset.

parameters.name: requestData.includeWorkItems
parameters.description: Whether to include workItems

parameters.name: requestData.maxChangeCount

parameters.name: requestData.maxCommentLength

parameters.name: requestData.name

get.description: Get a single branch hierarchy at the given path with parents or children as specified.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Full path to the branch.  Default: $/ Examples: $/, $/MyProject, $/MyProject/SomeFolder.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: includeParent
parameters.description: Return the parent branch, if there is one. Default: False

parameters.name: includeChildren
parameters.description: Return child branches, if there are any. Default: False

get.description: Get a collection of branch roots -- first-level children, branches with no parents.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: includeParent
parameters.description: Return the parent branch, if there is one. Default: False

parameters.name: includeChildren
parameters.description: Return the child branches for each root branch. Default: False

parameters.name: includeDeleted
parameters.description: Return deleted branches. Default: False

parameters.name: includeLinks
parameters.description: Return links. Default: False

get.description: Get Item Metadata and/or Content for a single item. The download parameter is to indicate whether the content should be available as a download or just sent as a stream in the response. Doesn't apply to zipped content which is always returned as a download.

parameters.name: organization
parameters.description: The name of the Azure DevOps organization.

parameters.name: path
parameters.description: Version control path of an individual item to return.

parameters.name: project
parameters.description: Project ID or project name

parameters.name: fileName
parameters.description: file name of item returned.

parameters.name: download
parameters.description: If true, create a downloadable attachment.

parameters.name: scopePath
parameters.description: Version control path of a folder to return multiple items.

parameters.name: recursionLevel
parameters.description: None (just the item), or OneLevel (contents of a folder).

values.description: Only return the specified item.
Return the specified item and its direct children.
Return the specified item and its direct children, as well as recursive chains of nested child folders that only contain a single folder.
Return specified item and all descendants

parameters.name: versionDescriptor.version
parameters.description: Version object.

parameters.name: versionDescriptor.versionOption
parameters.description: Version descriptor.  Default is null.

values.description: None.
Return the previous version.
Only usuable with versiontype MergeSource and integer versions, uses RenameSource identifier instead of Merge identifier.

parameters.name: versionDescriptor.versionType
parameters.description: Version descriptor.  Default is null.

values.description: Version is treated as a ChangesetId.
Version is treated as a ChangesetId.
Version is treated as a Shelveset name and owner.
Version is treated as a Change.
Version is treated as a Date.
If Version is defined the Latest of that Version will be used, if no version is defined the latest ChangesetId will be used.
Version will be treated as a Tip, if no version is defined latest will be used.
Version will be treated as a MergeSource.

parameters.name: includeContent
parameters.description: Set to true to include item content when requesting json.  Default is false.

id.description: Id of associated the work item.

url.description: REST Url of the work item.

changeType.description: The type of change that was made to the item.

newContent.description: Content of the item after the change.

sourceServerItem.description: Path of the item on the server.

creationDate.description: The timestamp when the repository was created.

isDisabled.description: True if the repository is disabled. False otherwise.

isFork.description: True if the repository was created as a fork.

isInMaintenance.description: True if the repository is in maintenance. False otherwise.

collection.description: Team Project Collection where this Fork resides

isFork.description: True if the repository was created as a fork

_links.description: This field contains zero or more interesting links about the graph subject. These links may be invoked to obtain additional relationships or more detailed information about this graph subject.

descriptor.description: The descriptor is the primary way to reference the graph subject while the system is running. This field will uniquely identify the same graph subject across both Accounts and Organizations.

displayName.description: This is the non-unique display name of the graph subject. To change this field, you must alter its value in the source provider.

url.description: This url is the full route to the source resource of this graph subject.

directoryAlias.description: Deprecated - Can be retrieved by querying the Graph user referenced in the "self" entry of the IdentityRef "_links" dictionary

imageUrl.description: Deprecated - Available in the "avatar" entry of the IdentityRef "_links" dictionary

inactive.description: Deprecated - Can be retrieved by querying the Graph membership state referenced in the "membershipState" entry of the GraphUser "_links" dictionary

isAadIdentity.description: Deprecated - Can be inferred from the subject type of the descriptor (Descriptor.IsAadUserType/Descriptor.IsAadGroupType)

isContainer.description: Deprecated - Can be inferred from the subject type of the descriptor (Descriptor.IsGroupType)

profileUrl.description: Deprecated - not in use in most preexisting implementations of ToIdentityRef

ReferenceLinks.description: The class to represent a collection of REST reference links.

links.description: The readonly view of the links.  Because Reference links are readonly, we only want to expose them as read only.

TeamProjectReference.description: Represents a shallow reference to a TeamProject.

defaultTeamImageUrl.description: Url to default team identity image.

values.description: Project is in the process of being deleted.
Project is in the process of being created.
Project is completely created and ready to use.
Project has been queued for creation, but the process has not yet started.
All projects regardless of state except Deleted.
Project has not been changed.
Project has been deleted.

url.description: Url to the full version of the object.

values.description: The project is only visible to users with explicit access.
The project is visible to all.

children.description: List of children for the branch.

relatedBranches.description: List of paths of the related branches.

VssJsonCollectionWrapper.description: This class is used to serialize collections as a single JSON object on the wire.

api-Version-preview.1.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.1.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '7.2-preview.1' to use this version of the api.

api-Version-preview.3.name: api-version
api-Version-preview.3.description: Version of the API to use.  This should be set to '7.2-preview.3' to use this version of the api.

accessToken.description: Personal access token. Use any value for the user name and the token as the password.

scopes.vso.code: Grants the ability to read source code and metadata about commits, changesets, branches, and other version control artifacts. Also grants the ability to search code and get notified about version control events via service hooks.
scopes.vso.code_write: Grants the ability to read, update, and delete source code, access metadata about commits, changesets, branches, and other version control artifacts. Also grants the ability to create and manage pull requests and code reviews and to receive notifications about version control events via service hooks.
